org.hatemile.jee

Class AccessibleConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter

  • public class AccessibleConverter
extends Object
    The AccessibleConverter class help to convert the HTML code in a code more accessible.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ASSOCIATE_DATA_CELLS
      The filter-parameter to associate data cells with header cells.
      static String ASSOCIATE_LABELS
      The filter-parameter to associate labels with fields.
      static String DISPLAY_ALTERNATIVE_TEXT
      The filter-parameter to display the alternative text of images.
      static String DISPLAY_CELLS_HEADER
      The filter-parameter to display the content of cells headers in data cells.
      static String DISPLAY_DRAGS_DROPS
      The filter-parameter to display when a element has drag or drop events.
      static String DISPLAY_LANGUAGES
      The filter-parameter to display the language of elements.
      static String DISPLAY_LINK_ATTRIBUTES
      The filter-parameter to display the attributes of links.
      static String DISPLAY_ROLES
      The filter-parameter to display the roles of elements.
      static String DISPLAY_SHORTCUTS
      The filter-parameter to display the shortcuts of elements.
      static String DISPLAY_TITLES
      The filter-parameter to display the titles of elements.
      static String DISPLAY_WAI_ARIA
      The filter-parameter to display the WAI-ARIA states of elements.
      static String HIDE_CHANGES
      The filter-parameter to hide visual changes of HaTeMiLe for Java.
      static String MAKE_ACCESSIBLE_CLICK
      The filter-parameter to make click events accessible by keyboard.
      static String MAKE_ACCESSIBLE_DRAG_DROP
      The filter-parameter to make drag and drop events accessible by keyboard.
      static String MAKE_ACCESSIBLE_HOVER
      The filter-parameter to make hover events accessible by keyboard.
      static String MARK_AUTOCOMPLETE_FIELD
      The filter-parameter to mark autocomplete fields.
      static String MARK_INVALID_FIELD
      The filter-parameter to mark invalid fields.
      static String MARK_RANGE_FIELD
      The filter-parameter to mark range fields.
      static String MARK_REQUIRED_FIELD
      The filter-parameter to mark required fields.
      static String NAVIGATE_TO_HEADING
      The filter-parameter to provide links to navigate to headings.
      static String NAVIGATE_TO_LONG_DESCRIPTION
      The filter-parameter to provide links to navigate for long description of images.
      static String NAVIGATE_TO_SKIPPER
      The filter-parameter to provide links to skip parts.
      static String PROVIDE_SPEAK_PROPERTIES
      The filter-parameter to provide a polyfill to speak and speak-as properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccessibleConverter

        public AccessibleConverter(String pageCode,
                           String configurationPath,
                           Map<String,Boolean> filterParameters,
                           Locale locale,
                           String currentURLPage,
                           String userAgentClient)
        Initializes the converter.
        Parameters:
        pageCode - The HTML code of page.
        configurationPath - The full path of configuration file.
        filterParameters - The setted parameters of converter.
        locale - The locale of client.
        currentURLPage - The current URL of page.
        userAgentClient - The user-agent of client.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public String convert()
        Convert HTML code in a HTML code more accessible.
        Returns:
        The HTML code more accessible.
